item.title: Who Am I?

item.description: Table of Contents 1. What this blog is about 2. Bio 3. Other things about me 4. Get on with it! 5. Changelog Hi there, friends! ðŸ‘‹ 1. What this blog is about This little blog of mine serves as my personal collection of thoughts traversing the world of systems and software engineering with particular focus towards cloud native, cloud computing, DevOps, infrastructure, information security, cybersecurity, and open source software.
